formElement.label: NCover Installation Directory:
formElement.documentation: Provide the absolute path of the NCover installation directory. It must end with a backslash (\).

formElement.label: Target to Analyze:
formElement.documentation: Provide the absolute path of the element to analyze.

formElement.label: Target Parameters:
formElement.documentation: Additional commands to be entered for the target

formElement.label: Output Report Filename:
formElement.documentation: Filename of the output report

formElement.label: Log Level:
formElement.documentation: Select the log level to apply during analysis. Options are None, Normal, or Verbose.

formElement.label: Collect Cyclomatic Complexity Coverage Information:
formElement.documentation: Collect cyclomatic complexity coverage information.

formElement.label: Collect Symbol Coverage Information:
formElement.documentation: Collect symbol coverage information.

formElement.label: Collect Branch Coverage Information:
formElement.documentation: Collect branch information.

formElement.label: Collect Method Visits Coverage Information:
formElement.documentation: Collect Method Visits Information.

formElement.label: Minimum Cyclomatic Complexity Coverage:
formElement.documentation: Minimum Cyclomatic Complexity coverage. The build fails when thresholds are not met.

formElement.label: Minimum Symbol Coverage:
formElement.documentation: Minimum Symbol coverage. The build fails when thresholds are not met.

formElement.label: Minimum Method Visits Coverage:
formElement.documentation: Minimum Method Visits coverage. The build fails when thresholds are not met.

formElement.label: Minimum Branch Coverage:
formElement.documentation: Minimum Branch coverage. The build fails when thresholds are not met.

formElement.label: Allow Coverage on IIS:
formElement.documentation: Collect coverage information of the local IIS install.

formElement.label: Files to Exclude:
formElement.documentation: Files to exclude

formElement.label: Methods to Exclude:
formElement.documentation: Methods to exclude

formElement.label: Build ID:
formElement.documentation: Build ID to generate.

formElement.label: Project Name:
formElement.documentation: Specifies the name of the project for HTML output.

formElement.label: Additional Commands for NCover.Console:
formElement.documentation: Additional commands to be entered for NCover.Console

formElement.label: Additional Commands for NCover.Reporting:
formElement.documentation: Additional commands to be entered for NCover.Reporting

formElement.label: Working directory:
formElement.documentation: Working directory
